sub_fields.label: Subtitle
sub_fields.name: subtitle
sub_fields.instructions: (Optional) A subtitle for your section. It will appear above your title.

sub_fields.label: Title
sub_fields.name: title
sub_fields.instructions: (Optional) A title for your section.

sub_fields.label: Content
sub_fields.name: content
sub_fields.instructions: (Optional) A additional text for your section. Appears below the title.

sub_fields.label: Buttons
sub_fields.name: buttons
sub_fields.instructions: (Optional) Click add button to add a button to your section.

sub_fields.label: Text, Logo and Navigation Color
sub_fields.name: text_color
sub_fields.instructions: For dark backgrounds, you may want to select white.

sub_fields.label: Youtube Video
sub_fields.name: youtube_video
sub_fields.instructions: Enter the Youtube Video URL.

sub_fields.label: Video Image PlaceHolder
sub_fields.name: video_image_placeholder
sub_fields.instructions: Placeholder for images. These will display during the loading of videos and for mobile devices where video backgrounds are disabled.

sub_fields.label: Background Image
sub_fields.name: background_image
sub_fields.instructions: Image should be at least 1500px wide.

sub_fields.label: Background Color
sub_fields.name: background_color
sub_fields.instructions: Solid background color for your section.

sub_fields.label: Overlay Color
sub_fields.name: overlay
sub_fields.instructions: Overlay color above videos and images.

sub_fields.label: Overlay Opacity
sub_fields.name: overlay_opacity
sub_fields.instructions: Percentage opacity for the overlay.

sub_fields.label: Section Caption
sub_fields.name: credits
sub_fields.instructions: Add a caption or credits for the section in the lower right corner.

sub_fields.label: Scroll Indicator Arrow
sub_fields.name: scroll_arrow
sub_fields.instructions: Turn on/off the arrow indicator to scroll to next section.

sub_fields.label: Slides
sub_fields.name: slides
sub_fields.instructions: Click Add Slide to add a new slide to the section.
